column4: anyone know how to manually start/overide an acer wireless button.  Its designed to look for something from windows 7

acer laptops are _HELL_ i fixed up one that would not turn on bluetooth unless the windows app was run. you can try taking the battery out and the mains, to make it forget it's been turned off, set the button to the 'on' state then boot ubuntu again, but it might be harder than that
- i had to boot into windows 7 and restart
:( yeah that'd probably do it - nothing on google for your model? i've no other ideas i'm afraid
